pages.text: Marisa's Broom is a convenient flying vehicle (?). After mounting on the broom by right-clicking, you can control your motion in the same way as of riding on horse. $(br2)Maids will auto mount onto broom if they are closed to them. Maids on brooms will also tend to fly in the sky.
However, currently, players can only ride on broom in creative mode by default. You can change this behavior in config file.
